mapper.insert: insert into board values ( board_no_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberNo}, 0, SYSDATE, 1, board_group_no_seq.nextval, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE no = #{no}
update board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where no= #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT (*) OVER () AS TOTCNT, COUNT (*) OVER () - ROWNUM +1 as articleSequence FROM ( SELECT a.NO as no, a.TITLE as title, a.CONTENT as content, a.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, b.NAME as name, a.VIEW_CNT as viewCount, a.REG_DATE as regDate, a.ORDER_NO as orderNo, a.GROUP_NO as groupNo, a.DEPTH as depth FROM board a, MEMBER b WHERE a.member_no = b.no ORDER BY a.reg_date DESC) A) WHERE RNUM > #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT (*) OVER () AS TOTCNT, COUNT (*) OVER () - ROWNUM +1 as articleSequence FROM ( SELECT a.NO as no, a.TITLE as title, a.CONTENT as content, a.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, b.NAME as name, a.VIEW_CNT as viewCount, a.REG_DATE as regDate, a.ORDER_NO as orderNo, a.GROUP_NO as groupNo, a.DEPTH as depth FROM board a, MEMBER b WHERE a.member_no = b.no AND a.TITLE like #{word} ORDER BY a.reg_date DESC) A) WHERE RNUM > #{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}
select count(*) as count from board where title like #{word}
select count(*) as count from board
